meaningMnemonic: You have the <kanji>appearance</kanji> of <kanji>doubt</kanji> about you. That's because you're under <vocabulary>suspicion</vocabulary>. There's a <vocabulary>charge</vocabulary> against you. Oh no!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
